Chapter 4378 - Chapter 4378: When The 4377 War Broke Out

Chapter 4378: When the 4377 war broke out

“Eh? The evil sequence camp and the Justice Alliance are in a war?”

When Wang Xian received the news, his eyes were filled with astonishment.

The calamity had just broken out a few years ago, but the evil sequence camp had already broken out into a war?

There were still billions of years to come.

“Maybe it’s because the Justice Alliance is getting stronger and stronger.”

Wang Xian thought to himself.

In the universe of the evil sequence faction, they were good at invading other universes.

Under such circumstances, those universes that were invaded naturally wanted to hide and seek help.

In the end, they would join the Justice Alliance.

The more universes they invaded, the more universes would feel afraid and sense danger. They had no choice but to join the Justice Alliance.

The power of the Justice Alliance universe was becoming stronger and stronger under the pressure of the evil sequence universe.

If this continued, one day, the power of the Justice Alliance would surpass that of the evil sequence universe.

This was also the reason why the evil sequence universe wanted to invade the Justice Alliance universe.

This was because they could only invade the Justice Alliance now.

Attacking other universes would instead cause more universes to join the Righteous Alliance.

When the strength of the righteous alliance was strong enough, with the hatred the righteous alliance had for the evil sequence faction, they would definitely turn around and attack them.

Therefore, the evil sequence faction had decided to invade the Righteous Alliance now and weaken the strength of the Righteous Alliance.

They even wanted to destroy it.

Wang Xian was not too interested in the war between the two factions.

He brought the disciples of the Dragon Palace and flew towards the sky-absorbing universe.

The disciples of the Dragon Palace who could achieve a breakthrough this time were of the wood element.

The sky-absorbing universe, the sword and the magic universe both had a quota of the wood element. Therefore, Wang Xian did not need to go out and look for this quota.

After arriving at the sky-absorbing universe, the breakthrough of the disciples of the Dragon Palace went very smoothly.

After an easy breakthrough, Wang Xian returned to the Great Dao of Heaven once again.

At this point, the twelfth disciple of the Dragon Palace who was in the Heavenly Kismet Realm was born.

Time passed quickly once again.

Wang Xian was at the Great Dao of Heaven. Occasionally, he would look at the heaven-origin communicator to check on the situation of the battle.

According to the information above, several universes in the righteous universe had been massacred by the evil sequence alliance!

Countless lives had died.

The heaven creation realm experts had fallen.

After the Justice Alliance experts arrived there, a world-shaking battle broke out.

Over a hundred heaven creation realm experts from both sides broke out in battle.

There were casualties on both sides.

This caused the battle to temporarily stabilize.

However, battles broke out everywhere.

There were even a few great dao realm experts from the evil sequence alliance who had joined forces to ambush the Justice Alliance experts.

They had killed seven to eight heaven origin creation level powerhouses from the justice universe.

In short, although the Justice Alliance was stronger now, their overall strength was still inferior to the evil sequence faction.

Although Wang Xian was interested in the war between the two major factions, he did not participate in it.

If he participated in a war at this level, he would be trapped.

Both the Justice Alliance and the evil sequence faction seemed to have chaos-level existences.

There were also a large number of heaven origin blessed realm existences.

Although Wang Xian was strong, he was not invincible.

Furthermore, since his elemental god fragment was stolen this time, Wang Xian suspected that 90% of it was done by the powerhouses in the Justice Alliance.

Therefore, Wang Xian wouldn’t be foolish enough to help the Justice Alliance.

Was it not satisfying to slowly improve his strength first?

Time passed again. More than a million years later, another heaven origin creation was born in the Dragon Palace. It had a metal attribute. There was still no need to look for a spot. It was a direct breakthrough in the heavenly universe.

More than three million years later, another one was born in the Dragon Palace. It had a light attribute.

It was still a breakthrough in the universe.

Five million years later, the Dragon Palace gave birth to another heavenly yuan creation realm expert.

Wind attribute.

Nine million years later, the Dragon Palace gave birth to a heavenly yuan creation realm expert with the wind attribute.

At this point, the Dragon Palace only had wood and light attribute slots.

The other attribute slots were all used up!

At this point, the Dragon Palace had sixteen Heavenly Yuan creation realm experts.

Sixteen Heavenly Yuan creation realm experts was a huge number.

The Dragon Palace was able to produce heavenly yuan creation realm experts so quickly.

One reason was that they obtained resources from the Void Universe. These resources were exchanged for various treasures used by the Justice Alliance to break through.

Another reason was that cultivating in the primal chaos gem for a million years was equivalent to a hundred million years.

Coupled with the majestic energy of the Great Dao of Heaven, it was why the experts of the Dragon Palace were born so quickly.

“HMM? I’m about to break through!”

On this day, Wang Xian had a thought and a smile appeared on his face.

The body of the Void Divine Dragon had been cultivating in the primal chaos stone for more than a billion years. Finally, he had broken through!

His strength had reached the level of control. When he used the Void Dragon Disc, he could also use the Void Dragon Disc!

This allowed Wang Xian to instantly increase the combat strength of two people who had just entered the Heaven’s origin creation stage.

His strength had reached the chaos level, the Great Dao level, the control level, and the beginner level.

A smile appeared on Wang Xian’s face.

He had two ultimate treasures of the Heaven’s origin creation stage!

With all kinds of powerful means, Wang Xian felt that he was abnormally powerful now!

“Next, I will continue to improve.”

Wang Xian thought to himself.

However, what Wang Xian didn’t expect was that not long after, something broke his peaceful cultivation life!

It was located in the Dragon Palace of the nine-origin universe.

On this day, very suddenly, Tianci’s body appeared in front of the ancestral tree.

A maternal fruit slowly disappeared!

Tianci appeared in the Dragon Palace with a trace of cold sweat on his face.

He breathed in the fresh air.

“What?”

Tianci’s sudden appearance caught Prime Minister Gui’s attention.

He immediately came to the Dragon King’s palace and looked at Tianci in surprise.

“Crown Prince Tianci, what are you doing?”

Prime Minister Gui looked at him in confusion and asked.

“Uncle Prime Minister Gui.”

Tianci greeted him politely before saying, “I was killed by someone, so I was resurrected here in the Dragon Palace.”

Yes, Tianci’s sudden appearance here was because he was resurrected here after his death.

Wang Xian gave Tianci a mother’s womb fruit.

This fruit had always been placed here in the Dragon Palace.

When Tianci died, he could be resurrected here immediately.

However, this mother-born fruit was consumed a little quickly.

“What? The Crown Prince was killed? Who Killed You?”

Prime Minister Gui’s eyes narrowed and he immediately said, “I’ll inform the Dragon King about this immediately!”!

“No need.”

Tianci opened his mouth and shook his head in refusal.

Although he was young, he was already very strong.

Moreover, his foster father had already helped him a lot.
